title: "Key drop rate"
body:
>It is possible to earn enough key fragments to open every chest you find in 4 week period.

Of course it is possible for that to happen, if it's RNG it's possible for anything to happen, but this isn't a realistic thing to say to anyone.

RNGwise it's possible to get a 1% chance thing come up 20 times in a row, does that make it likely?

>Getting enough keys to open 4 chests in a 4 week period is hard and requires a lot of play, but anybody can do it if they play enough.

This is a better way of saying it, but still leaves it so much up to interpretation that it's not even funny.

like anyone can get 12 fragments if they won 100 games per 4 weeks?

We don't need specific numbers, but a rough idea of the kind of wins it takes would be nice to know.

And it's not like telling us the rough number where you get 12 say 50% of the time is going to force you into a terrible thing, neither is telling us the worst case scenario for Keys.

replies.body: That's a really good question, I haven't had a key fragment in 1 or 2 weeks.  That said I never have  a cache of chests I can't open so it can't be too far out!

Well it's all relative like life isn't it? Everyone's experience is different so no matter what numbers someone tells you doesn't matter because you could get the complete opposite and be, "wtf you told me blah blah". So all you can do is not worry about it. Play the game, have fun and everything else is a bonus.
